title: The Assassin
writer: Cheng Ah (screenplay), T'ien-wen Chu (screenwriter), Hsiao-Hsien Hou (screenplay), Hai-Meng Hsieh (screenplay), Xing Pei (short story)
actors: Chen Chang, Qi Shu, Yun Zhou, Satoshi Tsumabuki
plot: A female assassin receives a dangerous mission to kill a political leader in eighth-century China.
awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 28 wins & 54 nominations.
